{{Infobox/Jutsu |ref=''[[Tō no Sho]]'', page 223 |image=Leaf Great Whirlwind.png |kanji=木ノ葉大旋風 |unnamed jutsu=No |romaji=Konoha Daisenpū |literal english=Tree Leaf Great Whirlwind |english tv=Leaf Hurricane
Severe Leaf Hurricane |game names=Leaf Great Hurricane |parent jutsu=Leaf Whirlwind |jutsu rank=C |jutsu classification=Taijutsu |jutsu class type=Offensive |jutsu range=Short |users=Rock Lee, Chen~anime, Metal Lee~anime, Might Guy~anime |debut manga=210 |boruto=No |sasuke retsuden=No |konoha shinden=No |blue vortex=No |debut anime=123 |debut shippuden=No |boruto anime=No |game debut=Naruto: Ultimate Ninja 3 |movie debut=Naruto Shippūden the Movie |jutsu media=Anime, Manga, Game, Movie }} While spinning, the user delivers a series of kicks. As they spin faster, they are lifted from the ground, allowing them to kick different areas of their target: first a low kick, then a middle kick, then a high kick. These are finished off with a heel drop. As a result of the spinning, targets cannot see the incoming kicks until just before they're struck. == References == [[es:Gran Remolino de la Hoja]] [[fr:Grande Tornade de Konoha]] [[pl:Konoha Daisenpū]] [[pt-br:Grande Furacão da Folha]]
